name: Chaos Wave
description:
*Dive into waves of chaos in this game! Die, die repeat and die again. 

In this rogue like game your main quest is complete 100 waves of enemy. In every 5 waves you get checkpoint. Some enemies can drop gold or heart(for increase your health). If you can't make progress on weapon which is you use, no problem! Change it with another powerful one!

This game made for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2

Move = W,A,S,D

Shoot = Left Mouse Button

Dash = Right Mouse Button

Buy weapon = Keyboard F
